ygData.subject: RE: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n comments
ygData.msgSnippet: I can pick up 50pp just in an hour or 2 in Lake Rathe, killing High Gnoll Shamans and Embalmers. At night kill Dry Bones for small bronze plate and FS weapons.
ygData.messageBody:
I can pick up 50pp just in an hour or 2 in Lake Rathe, killing High Gnoll
Shamans and Embalmers. At night kill Dry Bones for small bronze plate and FS
weapons. I am palking about at your level too, this is stuff I did at 24-28.
There are ghouls in NK halfway between the stone and wood bridges that
consistently drop Bronze weapons, usually good for another 15-20pp. Bandits
on the river in SK drop the same. If your over 30th, Spectres in Feerot drop
Scythes worth from 4pp for Bronze to 13pp for regular, Opals, Bpearls, Boxes
of Abu Kar. These are just a couple of easy money makers. The thing is
making money is like working for a living, you have to approach it like a
job and make the effort if thats what you really want. After level 30 the
cash just happens with the mobs dropping 1-3pp each and FS weapons to sell.
You can always find a mob that drops a good item and farm it though.

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 7:38 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the
stei n comments


From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

I think a lot of you people gushing about how easy it is to make money via
loot are exaggerating. I have a 23rd monk that works his butt off and he's
never had more than about 125pp in the bank at any one time. I've spent
time
in unrest. Where's the money there? FS weapons? The cash drops aren't
*that* great.

So if you have some advice for a player that is really tired of reading
about
how others have more than 1,000pp in the bank, let 'er rip.

Aggrevated,

Yoyodyne on Fennin Ro



----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Kuenster (Entex) <v-ntxck@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:21 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n
comments


> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> Aye, its all relative. Plats are very easy to get even after level 20. I
> have never had less than 100 in the bank since then and almost always over
> 1000. Today I am buying Blk Pearl Plat earrings and will have up to 1000
to
> blow on failures and if they all fail the only thing thats a pain is
getting
> 4 more BPs to play with. Replacing the 1000 is really easy. This is why I
> love the bazaars, I trade basically useless Plats for awesome items I or
my
> friends can actually use, what a great concept.
>
